redborne.description: A short avine man, he is lined with silver and grey feathers. He's wearing a thin pair of glasses that sit quite far from his face on his beak.
redborne.response: Please tell me you have goods for me! We've been running low lately on all of our stock. If you have anything to sell, I'll give you a fair price! I can also help you get started by selling you the basic tools you'll need to start gathering goods.
